about_the_game:
9 lovely tracks from the game, including a vocal performed version of the main theme not found in the main game.

Track list:
  • A World of Blue - Vocal 4:17
  • A World of Blue - Instrumental 4:17
  • Dark Velvet 3:40
  • Lampshades 0:57
  • Late Night Call 3:18
  • No Happy Endings 2:14
  • Noir Evenings 0:52
  • Questions 1:56
  • The Detective 1:36

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

short_description: 12 relaxing tunes to hone your detective skills to a sharp pointy weaponlike weapon.
